name: Asher Dash
description:
Asher Dash is a game, where your figure has to jump over the oncoming cars. Each car that your figure jumps over is another point added to your score. But hit one and it's GAME OVER!

Coins are rare, collect as many coins as you can along the way. Trust us - you're going to want them later.

Think you have what it takes? Download Asher Dash to find out!
